section.title: pricing schedules creating new Pricing Schedule Item
section.para: To create a new Pricing Schedule Item, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

anchor.xreflabel: 76796: Figure: Figure 10.108: Pricing Schedule for Item

section.para: When creating a new Pricing Schedule Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify which type of Pricing Schedule Item you want to create:
Item: Select if the Pricing Schedule is for an individual Item. If selected, the options shown in FINDME Figure 10.119 will appear.
Product Category: Select if the Pricing Schedule is for a Product Category. If selected, the options shown in FINDME Figure 10.120 will appear.
Enter the Item Number of the Item you want to add to the Pricing Schedule.
The browse button located to the right of the field leads to a searchable sold Items list. Multiple sold Items may be assigned to a single Pricing Schedule.

varlistentry.term:
quantity breaks in pricing schedules
pricing schedules quantity breaks in Qty. Break (Inventory UOM)

listitem.para: Enter the lowest quantity of the specified Item that must be purchased to receive the specified Price. The Quantity Break is measured in the Inventory Unit of Measure. Multiple Quantity Breaks may be assigned to a single Item.

varlistentry.term: pricing schedules pricing detail for Price (Pricing UOM)

listitem.para: Enter the Price the specified Item may be purchased for if the specified Quantity Break is met. The Price is measured in the Price Unit of Measure.
Displays the List Price for the specified Item.
Displays the Price Unit of Measure for the specified Item.
Displays the ratio between the Price and Inventory Units of Measure for the specified Item.
Displays Standard Cost and Actual Cost for the specified Item.
The margin is determined by the following formula: Price - Cost / Price.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating the Pricing Schedule Item, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Pricing Schedule Item and adds it to the Pricing Schedule.

section.para:
pricing schedules by product category
product categories pricing schedules for If you are creating a new Pricing Schedule for a Product Category, the following screen will appear:

anchor.xreflabel: 46818: Figure: Figure 10.109: Pricing Schedule for Product Category

section.para: When creating a new Pricing Schedule for a Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Product Category you want to add to the Pricing Schedule.
All Items in the Product Category will be subject to the specified Quantity Break and Discount. Multiple Product Categories may be assigned to a single Pricing Schedule.

varlistentry.term:
quantity breaks in pricing schedules
pricing schedules quantity breaks in Qty. Break (Inventory UOM)

listitem.para: Enter the lowest quantity that must be purchased to receive the specified Discount. The Quantity Break applies to all Items in the specified Product Category. Multiple Quantity Breaks may be assigned to a single Product Category.

varlistentry.term: pricing schedules discount percentage for Discount Percent (List Price)

listitem.para: Enter the Discount percentage off List Price to be used when the specified Quantity Break is reached. The List Prices for all Items in the Product Category will be reduced by the specified percentage.
